ygData.subject: Hiya
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey ya all!  I just joined this group yesterday but I ve been playing EQ quite some time.  Though, I only have one character.  I m a 47 druid.  Seems
ygData.messageBody:
Hey ya all! I just joined this group yesterday but I've been playing
EQ quite some time. Though, I only have one character. I'm a 47
druid. Seems everyone's talking about KS's huh? those definitely
suck. Doesn't happen to me much but when it does, it really sucks.
I was camping Starsine one day when I was like level 30 or something
to get that ToV and then this cleric starts nuking starsine while I
was away from my computer and it was suppose to be mine cuz I've been
waiting in line forever. I did get it eventually though. It's too
bad these GMs don't do anything about KS's usually.
